Name: consumer_party_helper
clcommon__Content__c:
What is Add Party?
Please select on “Add Party” to input the basic co-borrower information . An email is sent to the co-borrower to login with their email id as username and input their personal information and employment information .The application will be submitted for further processing only when all the borrowers submit their information
What happens when I click next?
Please click on “Next” to continue with filling in your employment information and complete your portion of the loan application.
